game.name: Fortified Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Seize control of enemy planets in this nostalgic space sim and tower defense game made in the style of classic Flash games. Start by dominating orbital space in starship combat with railguns, defense turrets, and shields. Once clear, land on the surface to build a base and destroy waves of enemies.
